name: Holy Drain
description:
You are a protector of Heaven and the only person who can help save the Heaven.

Alien objects are appearing and they seem to drain the holy energy from around them. Without the holy energy, the Heaven cannot exist. It dies like a battery.

Help save the Heaven with your weapon, but be careful: you are not immune. If your holy energy is drained, you die like a battery.

Controlls:

W, S, A, D - move

Space - jump

LMB - shoot draining ray

Objective: Survive as long as you can

Made with Unreal Engine by richbomb
